page.title: 03Syston Parish Church.
page.content:
{SYSTON PARISH CHURCH (built 1430) Many years ago there was a big, annual Church Festival, but now Syston Carnival has taken its place. The ceiling of the church is thought to be carved by the monks from Ulverscroft Priory. The church has 20 services a week and 4 on Sunday.The graveyard is closed and a new cemetery has been opened on Barkby Road. Approx. 50 babies are baptised each year. This is an increase on ten years ago.
{CHURCH CONGREGATION A survey of 284 children aged between 5 and 11 years showed that; { 32}(11.3%) attended a Sunday service { 52}(18.3%) attended a Sunday school.
